'''1.7.10 Build 7''' is the seventh build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released in 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]].

== Additions ==

=== General ===
'''[[MinecraftEdu Launcher|Launcher]]'''
* Possibility to test translations directly in the Launcher.
* Time Slider also implemented on Server.
